albus.predictor.gam

Class GAM

  • java.lang.Object
    • albus.predictor.gam.GAM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable<Predictor>, Writable, Classifier, Predictor, ProbabilisticClassifier, Regressor

    public class GAM
extends Object
implements ProbabilisticClassifier, Regressor
    Class for generalized additive models (GAMs).

      • add

        public void add(int[] term,
                Regressor regressor)
        Adds a new term into this GAM. The term is an array of attribute indices that are used in the regressor.
        Parameters:
        term - the new term to add.
        regressor - the new regressor to add.
